trans-unit.source: Manages the display attributes for three-dimensional (3D) chart areas.
This class provides the styles for 3D chart areas, and is exposed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別提供 3D 圖表區域的樣式，並使用公開<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To enable 3D for a chart area, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Enable3D%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用 3D 圖表區域，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Enable3D%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This causes 3D to be applied to all data series drawn in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致套用至所有的資料數列在圖表區域中繪製 3D。

trans-unit.source: An isometric projection of a chart area can be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A> property to `true`, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: 可以藉由設定顯示的圖表區域等投影<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A>屬性`true`，預設值。

trans-unit.source: Isometric views are not actually 3D, because the displayed angles of rotation may not match the actual angles of rotation around the vertical and horizontal axes.
trans-unit.target: 等檢視不會實際 3D，因為顯示的旋轉的角度可能不符合實際的周圍的垂直和水平軸的旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: The actual angles are controlled using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Rotation%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Inclination%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制實際角度<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Rotation%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Inclination%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about isometric projections, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需等投影的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this class to:
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用此類別：

trans-unit.source: Cluster bar and column chart data series using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsClustered%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 叢集列和資料行圖表資料數列中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsClustered%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Control the lighting effects using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.LightStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制使用的光源效果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.LightStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the width of chart area walls using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.WallWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定使用的圖表區域牆的寬度<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.WallWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the amount of perspective with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Perspective%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定與檢視方塊量<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Perspective%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Control the depth of data points and the distance between data rows using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointDepth%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointGapDepth%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 控制資料點和使用的資料列之間的距離的深度<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointDepth%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointGapDepth%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: Rotate a chart area using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Inclination%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Rotation%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉圖表區域使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Inclination%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Rotation%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To work with coordinates of 3D points, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 3D 點的座標，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D>類別。

trans-unit.source: When a chart is set to 3D, the following chart features are not valid:
trans-unit.target: 當圖表設定為 3D 時，下列圖表功能不是有效的：

trans-unit.source: Scale breaks
trans-unit.target: 刻度斷層

trans-unit.source: Gradients
trans-unit.target: 漸層

trans-unit.source: Scrolling and zooming
trans-unit.target: 捲動和縮放

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle" /> class using the <paramref name="chartArea" /> parameter.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the flag toggles the 3D on and off for a chart area.
<see langword="true" /> the chart area is displayed using 3D, <see langword="false" /> if the chart area is displayed in 2D.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 圖表區域會顯示使用 3D，<see langword="false" />如果 2D 中顯示的圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Toggles the three-dimensional display of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: 切換 3d 圖表區域的顯示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle of rotation around the horizontal axes for 3D chart areas.
An <see langword="integer" /> that represents the angle of rotation around the horizontal axes for 3D chart areas.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />表示繞 3D 圖表區域的水平軸旋轉的角度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether data series for a bar or column chart are clustered; that is, displayed along distinct rows.
<see langword="true" /> if data series for a bar or column chart are clustered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果資料數列的橫條或直條圖已叢集化;否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether a chart area is displayed using an isometric projection.
<see langword="true" /> if the chart area is displayed using an isometric projection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果在圖表區域會顯示使用等的投影。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Isometric views are not actually 3D, because the displayed angles of rotation may not match the actual angles of rotation around the vertical and horizontal axes.
trans-unit.target: 等檢視不會實際 3D，因為顯示的旋轉的角度可能不符合實際的周圍的垂直和水平軸的旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: The actual angles are controlled using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Rotation%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Inclination%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制實際角度<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Rotation%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Inclination%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: Note the following points concerning isometric projection:
trans-unit.target: 請注意下列有關等投影的重點：

trans-unit.source: It is not "real" 3D.
trans-unit.target: 它不是 「 實際 」 3D。

trans-unit.source: That is, the angle of rotation around axes doesn't use true rotational angles.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，繞軸旋轉的角度不會使用，則為 true 的旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: It is ideal for displaying 3D charts with some depth.
trans-unit.target: 非常適合用於顯示 3D 圖表具有某些深度。

trans-unit.source: If your application allows end-users to rotate the charts, the rotation will not be smooth.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式可讓使用者可以旋轉圖表，不會平滑旋轉。

trans-unit.source: In this case, using isometric views is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，不建議使用等的檢視。

trans-unit.source: With isometric projection, perspective is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 等投影，不支援檢視方塊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of lighting for a 3D chart area.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LightStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LightStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the percent of perspective for a 3D chart area.
An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the percent of perspective for a 3D chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />值，表示 3D 圖表區域的檢視方塊的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The allowable range is 0-100 percent, and the default is zero (0) percent.
trans-unit.target: 允許的範圍是 0-100 百分比，而預設值零 (0) %。

trans-unit.source: A perspective projection of any set of parallel lines that are not parallel to the projection plane converges to a vanishing point.
trans-unit.target: 遠近景深投射的任何一組不是平行投影平面平行線的聚合成消失點。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Perspective%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A> property will be automatically set to `false`, because these properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Perspective%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A>屬性將會自動設為`false`，因為這些屬性互斥。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the depth of data points displayed in a 3D chart area.
An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the depth of data points.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />值，表示資料點的深度。

trans-unit.source: The allowable range is 0-1000 percent.
trans-unit.target: 允許的範圍為 0-1000年%。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100%。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the depth of data points, and is represented as a percentage of the data point width.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會決定資料點的深度，以資料點寬度的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointDepth%2A> property can be applied to the depth of bar, column, line, pie and spline chart data points only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointDepth%2A>屬性可以套用至橫條圖、 資料行的深度折線圖、 圓形圖和曲線的圖表資料點只。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property for other chart types (for example, bubble and point charts) that cannot have their point depths "stretched", it will reserve extra space for the data points, but will not increase their depth.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不能有其 「 延展 」 的點深度其他圖表類型 （例如，泡泡圖和點圖） 中設定這個屬性，它將會保留額外的空間資料點，但將不會增加其深度。

trans-unit.source: You can display the chart as an isometric projection by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A> property to `true`, which is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以顯示圖表等的投影為藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A>屬性`true`，這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the point depth to appear to be more or less than the percentage set by this property, depending on the chart being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致多於或少於這個屬性，根據所顯示的圖表所設定的百分比看似的點深度。

trans-unit.source: To control the spacing between rows of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointGapDepth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制資料列之間的間距，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointGapDepth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between series rows in a 3D chart area.
An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the distance between data rows (that is, the data series) in the 3D chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />值，表示 3D 圖表區域中的資料列 （也就是資料數列） 之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The allowable range is 0-1000 percent, and the default is 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: 允許的範圍為 0-1000年百分比，以及預設值是 100%。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the distance between data rows, with each row corresponding to a data series.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定具有對應至資料數列的每個資料列的資料列之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement is expressed as a percentage of the distance between data points in one row.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位是以一個資料列中的資料點之間距離的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Changing the gap between columns or bars for column and bar chart types using the `PointWidth` custom property will affect the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointGapDepth%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 變更資料行或資料行和橫條圖類型使用的橫條之間的差距`PointWidth`自訂屬性將會影響<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointGapDepth%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A> property to `true` (the default value) to display the chart as an isometric projection.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.IsRightAngleAxes%2A>屬性`true`（預設值） 以顯示圖表等的投影。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the point gap depth to appear to be more or less than the percentage set by this property, depending on the chart being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致顯示不大於或小於這個屬性，根據所顯示的圖表所設定的百分比點間隙深度。

trans-unit.source: To control the depth of data points, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointDepth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制資料點的深度，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.PointDepth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle of rotation around the vertical axes for 3D chart areas.
An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the angle of rotation around the vertical axes for 3D chart areas.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />值，表示繞 3D 圖表區域的垂直軸旋轉的角度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the walls displayed in a 3D chart area.
An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the width, in pixels, of the walls displayed in a 3D chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" />表示的寬度，以像素為單位，顯示在 3D 圖表區域牆的值。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the width of the walls (for example, the back wall, side walls, and so forth) that are displayed in 3D chart areas.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定會顯示在 3D 圖表區域牆 （例如，背景牆、 側邊牆等等） 的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The allowable range is 0-30 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 允許的範圍為 0 到 30 像素。
